desc: Crescent Market located at 401 Realty Dr, Gretna, LA. We offer all Arabic produce. Fresh goat, lamb, and beef. Fresh bread everyday except Sunday. Organic produce. Hookahs and accessories. Kitchen appliances.

layout.text: Each week we offer the freshest chicken, lamb, goat and beef. We use the Halal tradition of processing our meats. Taste our halal processed meat from our butcher and you won't buy meat from any other butcher.
